headline: JPMorgan's Dimon and Citigroup's Fraser consider stablecoins in Wall Street crypto pivot
summary: The bosses of JPMorgan and Citigroup said Tuesday they intend to get involved in stablecoins, the latest evidence of how Wall Street is pivoting to embrace digital assets.

headline: Jamie Dimon Says JPMorgan Plans to Get More Involved in Stablecoins
summary: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon said during the company's earnings call Tuesday that the bank plans to get more involved with stablecoins.

headline: Paymentus (PAY) Surges 5.8%: Is This an Indication of Further Gains?
summary: Paymentus (PAY) saw its shares surge in the last session with trading volume being higher than average. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions may not translate into further price increase in the near term.

headline: Mastercard and Jonas Brothers To Debut Music Video In Support of Stand Up To Cancer
summary: PURCHASE, N.Y., July 15, 2025--Today, Mastercard builds on 15 years of support for Stand Up To Cancer ® (SU2C) by launching a new initiative in partnership with the global pop superstars, Jonas Brothers. Through the unifying power of music, Mastercard and the Jonas Brothers are honoring the inspiring ways people stand up to cancer every day. By using your Mastercard to help support cancer research and sharing how you stand up on social, Mastercard is inviting everyone to join the movement to mak

headline: PhotonPay Launches Physical Mastercard Commercial Credit Card to Empower Global Business Payments
summary: PhotonPay, a global digital financial infrastructure provider, today announced the launch of its physical Mastercard Commercial Credit Card, marks a new milestone in its global payment solution portfolio, and delivers a unified, secure payment experience to global businesses across both online and offline channels.

headline: Jim Cramer Says American Express Stock “Goes Higher”
summary: American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared his thoughts on. During the lightning round, a caller inquired about the company, and here’s what Cramer had to say in response: “Goes higher, Steve Squeri. Hey, wait till they report, then some clown always sells it, you can buy it better then.” […]

headline: Yeahka expands payment options for HSBC Digital Merchant Services
summary: Yeahka (9923.HK) is leveraging its extensive payment network to support HSBC in enhancing HSBC Digital Merchant Services by expanding the payment options available to its merchants in Hong Kong. The newly-added payment methods include Alipay, AlipayHK and WeChat Pay.

raw.headline: Yeahka expands payment options for HSBC Digital Merchant Services

headline: Odoo partners with Tyro to provide seamless payment services in Australia
summary: Odoo, a global leader of all-in-one business management software, has joined forces with Tyro, Australia's leading payments provider, to provide seamless payment experiences to small businesses and their customers.

headline: Australia's Central Bank Proposes Scrapping Surcharge on Card Payments -- Update
summary: By Stuart Condie SYDNEY--Australia's central bank has proposed scrapping surcharges on card payments in a shake-up of what it said were outdated rules costing consumers and businesses billions...
